verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5357>vials,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2980>talked<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G3427>me,<s%> Come <S%G1204>hither;<s%> I will <S%G1166>show<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4204>whore<s%> that <S%G2521>sitteth<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> waters: <S%G5204><s%>

With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> have committed <S%G4203>fornication,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2730>inhabitants<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> have been made <S%G3184>drunk<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> of <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G4202>fornication.<s%>

So <S%G2532><s%> he carried me <S%G667>away<s%> <S%G3165><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2521>sit<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> a scarlet <S%G2847>colored<s%> <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3686>names<s%> of <S%G988>blasphemy,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> in <S%G4209>purple<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> scarlet <S%G2847>color,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5558>decked<s%> with <S%G5557>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3135>pearls,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G946>abominations<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G168>filthiness<s%> of <S%G848>her<s%> fornication: <S%G4202><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3184>drunken<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3144>martyrs<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> when I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> I <S%G2296>wondered<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2295>admiration.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G1302>Wherefore<s%> didst thou <S%G2296>marvel?<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will <S%G2046>tell<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G941>carrieth<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> which <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns.<s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> thou <S%G1492>sawest<s%> <S%G2258>was,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3195>shall<s%> <S%G305>ascend<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> bottomless <S%G12>pit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G684>perdition:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2296>wonder,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> were <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G975>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> when they <S%G991>behold<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3748>that<s%> <S%G2258>was,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> and <S%G2539>yet<s%> <S%G2076>is.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G935>kings:<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> are <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> and <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> is not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G2064>cometh,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>continue<s%> a short <S%G3641>space.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou <S%G1492>sawest<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G935>kings,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> have <S%G2983>received<s%> no kingdom as <S%G3768>yet;<s%> <S%G932><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2342>beast.<s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> shall make <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G721>Lamb<s%> shall <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G2962>lords,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G935>kings:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> that are <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> are <S%G2822>called,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1588>chosen,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1325>put<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> to <S%G4160>fulfill<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1106>will,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4160>agree,<s%> <S%G3391><s%> <S%G1106><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> shall be <S%G5055>fulfilled.<s%>
